 2025-03382025-03-07DND
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIO BARIL of Gatineau, Quebec, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, as Ombusdperson for the Department of National Defence and the Canadian Armed Forces, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 2, 2025.
